Description: Ostracon, six small fragments of the body of a red-brown pottery vessel, the exterior of each piece is covered with a red-brown slip and very faint traces of a black-painted demotic text.
Dimensions: Height: 2.30 centimetres (max;fragment marked with Big Number)
Width: 2.50 centimetres (max;fragment marked with Big Number)
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393845) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393845)
